chart_description: This chart displays the percentage of transaction identifier (txid) exhaustion towards emergency autovacuum in PostgreSQL. When the number of unvacuumed dead rows reaches a certain threshold, an emergency autovacuum is triggered to prevent transaction ID wraparound. This chart helps track the frequency of emergency autovacuum triggered due to txid exhaustion.

dimension_descriptions.emergency_autovacuum: Emergency autovacuum is a feature in PostgreSQL that triggers an autovacuum when the number of unvacuumed dead rows reaches a certain threshold.
